bibl.title: The Life of Mani in the Context of Graeco-Roman Spiritual Biography.

bibl.title: For Particular Reasons. Studies in Honour of Jerker Blomqvist

bibl.seg: HÄGG T., The Life of Mani in the Context of Graeco-Roman Spiritual Biography.

Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 76 (2004), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 1.
